schema: {"collections": [{"name": "products", "document": {"properties": {"product_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique product identifier", "pattern": "^PRD[0-9]{7}$"}, "product_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the product"}, "description": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Detailed product description"}, "category": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Product category (e.g., Electronics, Clothing)"}, "manufacturer": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Product manufacturer"}, "price": {"bsonType": "decimal", "description": "Product price"}, "discount": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"discount_percentage": {"bsonType": "double", "minimum": 0, "maximum": 100, "description": "Discount percentage"}, "start_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount start date"}, "end_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount end date"}}}, "images": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of product image"}}, "variants": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"color": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Color of the product variant"}, "size": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Size of the product variant (e.g., S, M, L)"}, "sku": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Stock keeping unit"}, "inventory": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of units in stock"}}}}, "specifications": {"bsonType": "object", "description": "Product specifications (e.g., dimensions, weight)", "properties": {"dimensions": {"bsonType": "string"}, "weight": {"bsonType": "string"}, "material": {"bsonType": "string"}}}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the review"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "int", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 5, "description": "Rating given by the user"}, "comment": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Review comment"}, "date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date of the review"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}

{"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the product"}, "description": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Detailed product description"}, "category": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Product category (e.g., Electronics, Clothing)"}, "manufacturer": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Product manufacturer"}, "price": {"bsonType": "decimal", "description": "Product price"}, "discount": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"discount_percentage": {"bsonType": "double", "minimum": 0, "maximum": 100, "description": "Discount percentage"}, "start_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount start date"}, "end_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount end date"}}}, "images": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of product image"}}, "variants": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"color": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Color of the product variant"}, "size": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Size of the product variant (e.g., S, M, L)"}, "sku": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Stock keeping unit"}, "inventory": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of units in stock"}}}}, "specifications": {"bsonType": "object", "description": "Product specifications (e.g., dimensions, weight)", "properties": {"dimensions": {"bsonType": "string"}, "weight": {"bsonType": "string"}, "material": {"bsonType": "string"}}}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the review"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "int", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 5, "description": "Rating given by the user"}, "comment": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Review comment"}, "date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date of the review"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}

mongo_query: db.products.find({ 'discount.discount_percentage': { $gt: 20 }, 'discount.start_date': { $lte: new Date() }, 'discount.end_date': { $gte: new Date() } }, { product_name: 1, price: 1, category: 1 }).sort({ price: 1 })

"Product category (e.g., Electronics, Clothing)"}, "manufacturer": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Product manufacturer"}, "price": {"bsonType": "decimal", "description": "Product price"}, "discount": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"discount_percentage": {"bsonType": "double", "minimum": 0, "maximum": 100, "description": "Discount percentage"}, "start_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount start date"}, "end_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Discount end date"}}}, "images": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of product image"}}, "variants": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"color": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Color of the product variant"}, "size": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Size of the product variant (e.g., S, M, L)"}, "sku": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Stock keeping unit"}, "inventory": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of units in stock"}}}}, "specifications": {"bsonType": "object", "description": "Product specifications (e.g., dimensions, weight)", "properties": {"dimensions": {"bsonType": "string"}, "weight": {"bsonType": "string"}, "material": {"bsonType": "string"}}}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the review"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "int", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 5, "description": "Rating given by the user"}, "comment": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Review comment"}, "date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date of the review"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}
mongo_query: db.products.aggregate([{ $match: { manufacturer: '<SPECIFIED_MANUFACTURER>', price: { $gte: 50, $lte: 200 }, 'reviews.rating': { $gte: 4 } } }, { $sort: { price: 1 } }, { $limit: 5 }, { $project: { product_name: 1, price: 1 } }])
natural_language_query: Retrieve the top five products from a specified manufacturer priced between $50 and $200 with ratings of at least 4, sorted by price, showing their names and prices.

mongo_query: db.products.aggregate([{ $match: { 'discount.start_date': { $lte: new Date() }, 'discount.end_date': { $gte: new Date() } } }, { $group: { _id: '$manufacturer', totalProducts: { $sum: 1 } } }])

{"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the course"}, "description": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Course description"}, "instructor_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the course instructor"}, "category": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Course category (e.g., Programming, Design)"}, "level": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Course difficulty level (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)"}, "duration_hours": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated course duration in hours"}, "modules": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"module_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique module identifier"}, "module_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the module"}, "content_type": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Type of module content (e.g., Video, Text, Quiz)"}, "content_url": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of the module content"}, "duration_minutes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated module duration in minutes"}}}}, "enrollment_count": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of students enrolled in the course"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "double", "description": "Average course rating"}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the review"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "int", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 5, "description": "Rating given by the user"}, "comment": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Review comment"}, "date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date of the review"}}}}, "price": {"bsonType": "decimal", "description": "Course price"}, "certificate": {"bsonType": "bool", "description": "Indicates if a certificate is awarded upon completion"}}}}], "version": 1}

"Identifier of the course instructor"}, "category": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Course category (e.g., Programming, Design)"}, "level": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Course difficulty level (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)"}, "duration_hours": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated course duration in hours"}, "modules": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"module_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique module identifier"}, "module_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the module"}, "content_type": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Type of module content (e.g., Video, Text, Quiz)"}, "content_url": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of the module content"}, "duration_minutes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated module duration in minutes"}}}}, "enrollment_count": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of students enrolled in the course"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "double", "description": "Average course rating"}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the review"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "int", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 5, "description": "Rating given by the user"}, "comment": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Review comment"}, "date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date of the review"}}}}, "price": {"bsonType": "decimal", "description": "Course price"}, "certificate": {"bsonType": "bool", "description": "Indicates if a certificate is awarded upon completion"}}}}], "version": 1}

mongo_query: db.courses.find({ enrollment_count: { $gte: 20 }, price: { $lt: 100 } }, { course_name: 1, rating: 1 }).sort({ rating: -1 }).limit(10)
natural_language_query: Fetch the course names and average ratings of courses with at least 20 enrollments and a price under $100, sorted by rating in descending order, showing a maximum of ten courses.

difficulty level (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)"}, "duration_hours": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated course duration in hours"}, "modules": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"module_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique module identifier"}, "module_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the module"}, "duration_minutes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Estimated module duration in minutes"}}}}, "enrollment_count": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of students enrolled in the course"}, "rating": {"bsonType": "double", "description": "Average course rating"}, "reviews": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", schema: {"collections": [{"name": "posts", "document": {"properties": {"post_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique post identifier", "pattern": "^PST[0-9]{8}$"}, "user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who created the post"}, "post_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the post"}, "content": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Post content"}, "likes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of likes for the post"}, "comments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the comment"}, "comment_text": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Comment text"}, "comment_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the comment"}}}}, "shares": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of shares for the post"}, "privacy": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Privacy setting of the post (e.g., Public, Friends, Private)"}, "location": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"type": {"bsonType": "string", "enum": ["Point"], "description": "GeoJSON type"}, "coordinates": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "double"}, "description": "Longitude and latitude coordinates"}}}, "tags": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Tags associated with the post"}}, "attachments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"file_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the attached file"}, "file_type": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Type of the attached file (e.g., image, video)"}, "file_url": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of the attached file"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}

mongo_query: db.posts.aggregate([ { $match: { likes: { $gt: 200 } } }, { $project: { user_id: 1, likes: 1, post_date: { $dateToString: { format: "%Y-%m-%d", date: "$post_date" } } } } ])
natural_language_query: Retrieve user identifiers, likes count, and post dates formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD' for posts with more than 200 likes.

schema: {"collections": [{"name": "posts", "document": {"properties": {"post_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique post identifier", "pattern": "^PST[0-9]{8}$"}, "user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who created the post"}, "post_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the post"}, "content": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Post content"}, "likes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of likes for the post"}, "comments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the comment"}, "comment_text": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Comment text"}, "comment_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the comment"}}}}, "shares": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of shares for the post"}, "privacy": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Privacy setting of the post (e.g., Public, Friends, Private)"}, "location": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"type": {"bsonType": "string", "enum": ["Point"], "description": "GeoJSON type"}, "coordinates": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "double"}, "description": "Longitude and latitude coordinates"}}}, "tags": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Tags associated with the post"}}, "attachments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"file_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the attached file"}, "file_type": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Type of the attached file (e.g., image, video)"}, "file_url": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of the attached file"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}
mongo_query: db.posts.aggregate([{ $match: { likes: { $gt: 200 } } }, { $project: { user_id: 1, likes: 1, post_date: { $dateToString: { format: "%Y-%m-%d", date: "$post_date" } } } }])

natural_language_query: Count the total number of comments on posts with comments dated from January 1, 2023, onward.

schema: {"collections": [{"name": "posts", "document": {"properties": {"post_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Unique post identifier", "pattern": "^PST[0-9]{8}$"}, "user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who created the post"}, "post_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the post"}, "content": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Post content"}, "likes": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of likes for the post"}, "comments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Identifier of the user who wrote the comment"}, "comment_text": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Comment text"}, "comment_date": {"bsonType": "date", "description": "Date and time of the comment"}}}}, "shares": {"bsonType": "int", "description": "Number of shares for the post"}, "privacy": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Privacy setting of the post (e.g., Public, Friends, Private)"}, "location": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"type": {"bsonType": "string", "enum": ["Point"], "description": "GeoJSON type"}, "coordinates": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "double"}, "description": "Longitude and latitude coordinates"}}}, "tags": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Tags associated with the post"}}, "attachments": {"bsonType": "array", "items": {"bsonType": "object", "properties": {"file_name": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Name of the attached file"}, "file_type": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "Type of the attached file (e.g., image, video)"}, "file_url": {"bsonType": "string", "description": "URL of the attached file"}}}}}}}], "version": 1}
mongo_query: db.posts.aggregate([ { $match: { 'comments.comment_date': { $gte: new Date('2023-01-01') } } }, { $project: { commentCount: { $size: '$comments' } } }, { $group: { _id: null, totalComments: { $sum: '$commentCount' } } } ])
natural_language_query: Calculate the total number of comments on posts with comments dated January 1, 2023, or later.

mongo_query: db.posts.aggregate([{ $group: { _id: { user_id: "$user_id", post_id: "$post_id" }, count: { $sum: 1 } } }, { $project: { post_id: "$_id.post_id", user_id: "$_id.user_id", total_interactions: "$count" } }])

mongo_query: db.posts.aggregate([ { $project: { post_id: 1, content: 1, likes: 1, shares: 1, totalEngagement: { $add: ["$likes", "$shares"] } } }, { $sort: { totalEngagement: -1 } } ])
natural_language_query: Retrieve the post identifiers, content, likes, and shares, and calculate the total engagement score as the sum of likes and shares, ordered by the total engagement score in descending order.
